event.descr:
The OpenSSH sshd daemon reports an authentication failure for an invalid user
User name: %parm[user]%
Authentication method: %parm[authMethod]%
Remote host: %parm[remoteHost]%
Remote port: %parm[remotePort]%
SSH protocol version: %parm[protocolVersion]%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg: Invalid user %parm[user]% from host %parm[remoteHost]% failed OpenSSH %parm[authMethod]% authentication

event.descr:
The OpenSSH sshd daemon reports an authentication failure for a valid user
User name: %parm[user]%
Authentication method: %parm[authMethod]%
Remote host: %parm[remoteHost]%
Remote port: %parm[remotePort]%
SSH protocol version: %parm[protocolVersion]%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%

The OpenSSH sshd daemon failed to bind to a requested address and port
Bind address: %parm[bindAddress]%
Bind port: %parm[bindPort]%
Error message: %parm[errorMessage]%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg: OpenSSH sshd failed to bind to port %parm[bindPort]% of address %parm[bindAddress]%

event.event-label: OpenSSH-defined event: Total socket bind failure
event.descr:
The OpenSSH sshd daemon failed to bind to any requested addresses
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg: OpenSSH sshd failed to bind any address on host %nodelabel%

event.descr:
The OpenSSH sshd daemon at %interface% generated a Syslog Message.
Node ID: %nodeid%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg:
An unknown OpenSSH syslog message has been received

Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
